generation.description:
generation number of this configuration

This generation number is owned by the control plane (i.e., RSS or Nexus, depending on whether RSS-to-Nexus handoff has happened).  It should not be bumped within Sled Agent.

Sled Agent rejects attempts to set the configuration to a generation older than the one it's currently running.

Note that "Generation::new()", AKA, the first generation number, is reserved for "no datasets". This is the default configuration for a sled before any requests have been made.
